text: Wolford is a company specializing in clothing, tights, bodysuits and underwear. It also sells women's accessories. Its headquarters are in Bregenz, on Lake Constance. The company was founded in 1950. Wolford is also known for its cooperation with well-known photographers, who produce its advertising materials. It has also cooperated with well-known fashion designers such as Karl Lagerfeld or Vivienne Westwood. Category:Companies of Austria
title: Wolford
